sentences.sContent: She deputed the bookkeeping to me while he was away.
sentences.sContent_eng: She deputed the bookkeeping to me while he was away.
sentences.sCn: 在他外出时他把簿记工作交给了我。

sentences.sContent: It requires some kind of bookkeeping to keep records about transactions.
sentences.sContent_eng: It requires some kind of bookkeeping to keep records about transactions.
sentences.sCn: 它要求某些种类的簿记保存有关交易的记录。

sentences.sContent: Through those groups, the women learn to read and write, and learn bookkeeping and other skills.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through those groups, the women learn to read and write, and learn bookkeeping and other skills.
sentences.sCn: 加入这些小组后，妇女们可以学识字和写字，学习记帐和其它技能。

remMethod.val: book(书) + keeping(保持) → 把…保持成一本书的样子 → 簿记

words.tran: 簿记员；会计员；铁路的司旗员

trans.tranOther: Bookkeeping is the job or activity of keeping an accurate record of the money that is spent and received by a business or other organization
